name: Dimension Shift
description:
Prototype for a soothing and relaxing game of shape shifting.

**Best played with a graphics tablet or touchscreen**

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

TO PLAY:

Drag two 0D points together to make a 1D line.

Drag three 1D lines together to make a 2D triangle.

Drag four 1D lines together to make a 2D square.

Drag six 2D squares together to make a 3D cube.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

Created at Castle Game Jam 2016 in Orebro Sweden.

Programming: Anders Nord. Graphics: Zack Wood.
